mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPARTMENTS (DEPTNO, DEPTNAME, PARENT_DEPTNO, USE_YN, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_EMP) VALUES(#{deptno}, #{DEPTNAME}, #{PARENT_DEPTNO}, 'Y', TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD')), #{create_emp})
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEES SET DEPTNO = NULL WHERE DEPTNO IN ( SELECT DEPTNO FROM DEPARTMENTS d WHERE USE_YN = 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT d1.DEPTNO, d1.DEPTNAME, d2.DEPTNAME AS PARENT_DEPTNAME FROM DEPARTMENTS d1 LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENTS d2 ON d1.PARENT_DEPTNO = d2.DEPTNO START WITH d1.PARENT_DEPTNO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR d1.DEPTNO = d1.PARENT_DEPTNO AND d1.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER SIBLINGS BY d1.DEPTNO
SELECT d1.DEPTNO, d1.DEPTNAME, d2.DEPTNAME AS PARENT_DEPTNAME FROM DEPARTMENTS d1 LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENTS d2 ON d1.PARENT_DEPTNO = d2.DEPTNO WHERE d1.DEPTNO = 'D01'
SELECT DEPTNO, DEPTNAME, PARENT_DEPTNO, USE_YN, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_EMP, UPDATE_EMP FROM DEPARTMENTS WHERE USE_YN = 'N'
